      • triggerAnimation

        public void triggerAnimation(java.lang.String animationId)
        Triggers an animation of a specified view given an animationId. This will decide which animation, either walk, attack, or die is played in the imageView.
        Parameters:
        animationId - String id to find the corresponding animation

      • generateAnimation

        public javafx.scene.image.ImageView generateAnimation(javafx.scene.image.Image spriteImage,
                                                      int count,
                                                      int columns,
                                                      int spriteWidth,
                                                      int spriteHeight,
                                                      int animationTime,
                                                      java.lang.String animationId)
        Generates an animation for the sprite stored in the stackPane.
        Parameters:
        spriteImage - Image object of the spritesheet
        count - Number of images inside of the spritesheet
        columns - Number of columns included in the spritesheet
        spriteWidth - Width, in pixels, of an individual sprite
        spriteHeight - Height, in pixels, of an individual sprite
        animationTime - Total elapsed time of an animation
        animationId - Animation id used to set the corresponding ImageView
        Returns:
        ImageView with the running animation

      • updateAnimationSpeed

        public void updateAnimationSpeed(int speed)
        Utility method used to update the animation speed for each of the animations in order to support the functionality of fast forwarding
        Parameters:
        speed - int rate that will be set as the animation speed
